app_analysis.purpose: Track fitness progress through workouts, nutrition, and body measurements to achieve health goals
app_analysis.primary_user_goal: See today's progress and stay motivated to hit daily targets
app_analysis.hero_metric: Weekly workout streak - how many training days this week vs goal
app_analysis.mental_model: Users think in terms of TODAY (did I train? did I hit my macros?) and TRENDS (am I making progress over time?)

theme.distinctive_element: A vibrant coral/orange accent that energizes without being aggressive - paired with generous whitespace and bold typography that creates a premium fitness app feel
theme.background_treatment: Subtle warm off-white with a hint of peachy undertone - creates an energetic but calm canvas

mobile.structure: Single column with sticky header showing today's date, scrollable cards below
mobile.hero_element: Training streak ring/progress circle at the top - large and motivational

desktop.structure: Two-column layout with hero KPIs spanning full width at top, then split content below
desktop.column_arrangement: 60% main content (workouts, chart) | 40% sidebar (macros, quick stats)
desktop.sidebar: Today's nutrition progress, quick body stats, active goals
hover_reveals: Workout card shows full exercise breakdown on hover
Macro bars show exact grams on hover

hero_kpi.title: Diese Woche
hero_kpi.calculation: Count workouts where datum is within current week (Mon-Sun) and rest_day is not true
hero_kpi.context_shown: vs. goal from Ziele app (trainingstage_pro_woche), displayed as 'X von Y Trainings'

secondary_kpis.title: Kalorien heute
secondary_kpis.calculation: Sum of kalorien where datum = today
secondary_kpis.context: vs. taeglich_kalorien goal, show as progress bar

secondary_kpis.title: Protein heute
secondary_kpis.calculation: Sum of protein where datum = today
secondary_kpis.context: vs. taeglich_protein goal, show as progress bar with 'g' suffix

secondary_kpis.title: Aktuelles Gewicht
secondary_kpis.calculation: Most recent gewicht_kg entry by datum
secondary_kpis.context: Show trend arrow comparing to previous entry

chart.title: Gewichtsverlauf
chart.purpose: Show body weight trend over time to visualize progress
chart.mobile_treatment: Simplified with fewer data points, hide grid lines, larger touch targets

lists.title: Letzte Workouts
lists.purpose: Quick overview of recent training sessions to maintain awareness and motivation
